flawed_nl_solution:
To have an average speed of 70 mph over 5 hours he needs to travel 70*5=<<70*5=350>>350 miles.
He drove 60*3=<<60*3=108>>108 miles in the first 3 hours
He needs to travel another 350-108=<<350-108=242>>242 miles over the next 2 hours.
His speed needs to be 242/2=<<242/2=121>>121 mph
#### 121

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
